lead_paragraph: KAYE--Peter B. 12/9/55 - 5/25/14 It has been two heartbreaking years. The pain of your loss and absence never goes away. I think of you every hour of every day. With everlasting love, I remain lost without you. Mary 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  KAYE, PETER B

snippet: KAYE--Peter B. 12/9/55 - 5/25/14 It has been two heartbreaking years. The pain of your loss and absence never goes away. I think of you every hour of every day. With everlasting love, I remain lost without you. Mary 1/3
